backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing listings, inquiries, and user profiles with authorization, filtering, and CRUD/query operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining a warm light/dark color theme.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global layout, theming, and profile setup dialog for the app.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button component handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter their display name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper blocking access to protected content and showing a login prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Rental: Form to submit a rental inquiry with date validation, login requirement, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Application header with navigation links, user greeting, login button, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/listings/Listing: Displays a property listing in grid or list view with photo, details, and navigation to the listing page.
Filter bar for listings allowing text, type, price, and city filters with search and reset controls.
Form to create or edit a real estate listing with validation, photos, amenities, and address fields.
Photo gallery with main image, thumbnails, and a lightbox for navigating multiple listing photos.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates an authenticated or anonymous actor via react-query and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for CRUD operations on listings and inquiries using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Supplies hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom light and dark color palettes and global styling rules.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility functions to format prices, areas, and compact address strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with ReactDOM, InternetIdentityProvider, and react-query's QueryClient.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseListingsPage.ts: Listings browsing page with filters, pagination, grid/list view toggle, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/CreateListingPage.tsx: Authenticated page for creating a new listing using a form and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/EditListingPage.tsx: Authenticated page allowing owners to edit an existing listing with loading and access checks.
frontend/src/pages/InquiriesForMyListing: Displays inquiries for the user's own listings, allowing accepting or rejecting requests and switching between listings via tabs.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetailsPage.ts: Shows detailed information for a single listing, including photos, property details, and an inquiry form for users.
frontend/src/pages/MyInquiriesPage.tsx: Lists the user's submitted rental inquiries with status indicators and allows cancellation or navigation to related listings.
frontend/src/pages/MyListingsPage.tsx: Displays listings created by the user with options to create, edit, or delete listings and view their status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query string and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins used across the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, required images, and a list of existing frontend features for a realâ€‘estate listings app. Includes versioning, descriptions, and requirement links for implemented features.
